traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 (11d8 damage) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
